body.name: Tajsoon 9 Tier Tree Bookshelf with Drawer Bookcase, Floor Standing Book Storage Rack, Tall Bookshelf for CDs/Books/Movies, Bookshelf for Bedroom, Living Room, Home Office, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Multifunctional Book Shelf】The tall bookshelf is ont only featured with 9 tier shelves, but also with a drawer base, which can offer larger storage space to display your books, CDs, magazines, novels, decorations, towels or shoes,etc. Combined tree shaped design and vintage colors, our book tree bookshelf is also a decoration that can fit most home decor styles.
【Sturdy & Reliable】The tree bookcase adopts the geometric design, combining the 90° vertical structure along the boards and triangular base to ensure the stability and durability for long-term use.

【Spacious Yet Space-Saving】Sized at 14.6"L x 7.9"W x 53"H, this 9-tier bookshelf for bedroom can hold 5-10 books each shelf and with 22lbs load capacity of each storage rack. With its open design and small footprint, this tall bookshelf is ideal for corners and small spaces in living rooms, bedrooms, study rooms and offices, etc.

【Safe to Use】The tree bookshelf is made of 12mm high-quality particle board and with backboard reinforcement dedsign to provide great stability and durability. Besides, our tall bookshelf meets the EPA TSCA Title VI and Carb Certification, which can offer you a safe, healthy and large storage space in your room.

【Thoughtful Detail & Easy Assembly】Equipped with the anti-toppling device, it can help the bookshelf for bedroom stand firmly. Easy-to-follow instructions, numbered parts and assembly tools are all included in the package, allowing you to assemble this tall tree bookshelf quickly and easily.
body.description: Tajsoon Tree Bookshelf Refreshes Your Home With a tree-branch structure, this bookshelf is perfect for limited spaces like offices, living rooms, bedrooms, apartments, narrow corridors, classrooms, kids’ rooms, entryways,s or corners. This narrow bookshelf offers 8 tiers of open shelves and 1 draw that provide ample space for books, CDs, DVDs, photos, and ornaments. Artistic design and exquisite workmanship making your house more attractive.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tajsoon Tree Bookshelf Refreshes Your Home With a tree-branch structure, this bookshelf is perfect for limited spaces like offices, living rooms, bedrooms, apartments, narrow corridors, classrooms, kids’ rooms, entryways,s or corners. This narrow bookshelf offers 8 tiers of open shelves and 1 draw that provide ample space for books, CDs, DVDs, photos, and ornaments. Artistic design and exquisite workmanship making your house more attractive. Specifications Material: Particle Board Color: Black Storage area: 8 tier shelves + 1 drawer Weight Limit: 22 lbs/each shelf Dimension: 14.6"L x 7.9"W x 53"H

90° Vertical Link Panel Design The tree bookshelf adopts 90° vertical link panel design, making two link boards present a "T" shape, stable and not shaking to storage multiple books. Anti-Falling Accessory Anti-falling accessory included helps to prevent injury from unexpected tipping of furniture. Open Drawer The drawer provides an extra space to accessorize, organize, and store your items while keeping them tidy and organized at home office. High Quality Hardware The tall bookshelf is connected by these premium hardware to ensure the stablity and long-term use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a variety of items without fuss!
reviews.reviewText: As others mentioned, it is tricky to assemble. Tip: only screw in half way for all screws until all are in and lined up, then successively tighten. Once assembled, it works awesome. I was tired of my son's books toppling over for lack of a bookend, tired of looking for the perfect spot on a regular shelf to stack his toys/games. This completely solved all of that. Plus he can easily see everything at a glance. We love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, time consuming
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the greige tree shelf. It was a time consuming project that requires careful screwing of 43+ screws (!) with the wrench tool it comes with, plus my Phillips head screwdriver--all by hand. Since the shelves are slanted, it took careful handling to screw all of them in tightly without pushing any off balance. I was not expecting that kind of hours-long labor.The greige color is nice, a soft brownish color. I like the sturdy, heavy feel. If it's in a high traffic area or you have young kids, I'd definitely recommend using the wall anchor. Overall, a great value and very interesting display for my book collection!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: My 8 year old wanted a bookshelf for all of her chapter books and she got just that!!! She loves the way it looks and its functionality. Totally would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay but tough to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The holes were hard to line up with the pieces, and some of the holes were not drilled out fully, which made it more time-consuming to put together and disappointing for this price. Otherwise I made it work and like it overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful. Great quality.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has a tiny room in college and needed something that doesn’t take a ton of space. This shelf fits right by her door. It’s gorgeous. I had no trouble putting it together, not sure why so many reviews say otherwise. It’s actually very smart engineering. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, terrible instructions, awful stickers.
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely, stable piece. Unique. The instruction are not very detailed, so there were a couple of times I had to undo some screws and start over. But I am so annoyed by the stickers added to every piece of wood. They do not peel of easily and have left very sticky residue. One large sticker I am still attempting to get off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Wonderful Addition to My Classroom
reviews.reviewText: When I saw this bookcase offered at Amazon, I knew I wanted it in my classroom. I weighed the pros (many) and cons (having to pay for it myself since we pretty pay for everything, students’ supplies, etc.) and the pros won, and I made a few sacrifices and bought it. I am thankful it was on sale, because since we already started last week with a full eeek of Professional Development and this week working on our classrooms to welcome students next week, I am especially busy, so I paid a friend’s son who is between jobs to put it together. It took him less than 30 minutes. First, it is just gorgeous! I created a spot for it (that I only imagined it being there before 🙂). I have begun filling it with multicultural books, fiction: story books and realistic & historical fiction ones, and nonfiction: some biographies and historical books, all-in-all some decidable books where kids are to read every word, some leveled books on various levels where kids are encouraged to read at their independent level where they will know most of the words, and then harder books where kids can do different things with the books like looking for their high-frequency words or looking for nonfiction text features and learning along the way. I feel since it’s so beautiful and full of books kids love, students will find it that it is inviting and motivating them to read. Oh, this is a first grade classroom if interested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The paper directions are horrible. I guess you can watch a video while you're putting it together. I took it apart at least 4 times since they don't advise which side is which; for the open indents to attach future parts.
